医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，有妊娠期高血压病史的黑人女性中风的风险增加 66%与白人女性相比，美国黑人女性的先兆子痫和中风的负担要高得多，但几乎所有关于这两种疾病之间关联的现有证据都来自对白人女性的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Black-women-with-history-of-hypertense-disorders-of-pregnancy-have-6625-increased-risk-of-中风-研究-发现。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Black-women-with-history-of-hypertense-disorders-of-pregnancy-have-6625-increased-risk-of-中风-研究-发现。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46ea5bac-fe9c-49c4-8b08-2c566c989d9b Thu, 06 Jul 2023 14:10:04 -0400 Black women with history of hypertensive disorders of pregnancy have 66% increased risk of stroke, study finds
COST Connect：癌症研究合作与进步的平台战胜癌症是未来几年研究和创新的重大挑战。到 2030 年，预计欧盟将有超过 150 万人死于癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/COST-Connect-A-platform-for-collaboration-and-progress-in-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/COST-Connect-A-platform-for-collaboration-and-progress-in-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99962eba-09d4-491d-b765-e82c297d8616 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 14:01:19 -0400 COST Connect: A platform for collaboration and progress in cancer research
“Médecins Solidaires”和 dRural：两个对抗医疗荒漠的创新项目在法国，有 900 万人难以获得全科医生的帮助。在全球范围内，一半人口的初级保健资源少于城市人口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Medecins-solidaires-and-dRural-Two-innovative-projects-to-fight-medical-deserts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Medecins-solidaires-and-dRural-Two-innovative-projects-to-fight-medical-deserts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05e011e0-5c5e-47fe-80a1-1e755422fd1d Thu, 06 Jul 2023 13:48:18 -0400 "Médecins solidaires" and dRural: Two innovative projects to fight medical deserts
科学家开发出跨物种冠状病毒测试研究人员报告说，他们现在可以检测任何动物物种是否接触过 SARS-CoV-2 病毒，这一进展将帮助科学家追踪野生和家养动物中的冠状病毒变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Scientists-develop-cross-species-coronavirus-test.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Scientists-develop-cross-species-coronavirus-test.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc9752ef-3212-4bfd-bc71-6255ebcee425 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 13:18:05 -0400 Scientists develop cross-species coronavirus test
群体学习在癌症研究中展现出前景DECADE 研究项目是第一个在癌症研究中使用群体学习的项目。德国癌症援助机构正在为几所大学医院的联合项目提供约 150 万欧元的资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Swarm-learning-shows-promise-in-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Swarm-learning-shows-promise-in-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=788d2468-cc5e-495c-889e-5e0fa9a6c9c7 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 13:12:37 -0400 Swarm learning shows promise in cancer research
单细胞RNA测序为胃癌提供新见解德克萨斯大学MD安德森癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项新研究提供了对胃癌进展过程中肿瘤微环境演变的更深入的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Single-cell-RNA-sequencing-provides-new-insights-into-gastric-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Single-cell-RNA-sequencing-provides-new-insights-into-gastric-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e944a500-e7de-4a77-abac-c70e8d6132e0 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 13:05:04 -0400 Single-cell RNA sequencing provides new insights into gastric cancer
科学家开发出突破性方法在蛋白质复合物中创建人工变构位点根据一组科学家最近发表的一篇研究论文，已经开发出一种突破性的方法来在蛋白质复合物中创建人工变构位点（通过结合效应分子，调节远端活性位点的活性）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Scientists-develop-breakthrough-approach-to-create-artificial-allosteric-sites-in- Protein-complexes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Scientists-develop-breakthrough-approach-to-create-artificial-allosteric-sites-in- Protein-complexes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61425792-7cc0-40cb-8686-553a4ee1c29c Thu, 06 Jul 2023 13:03:24 -0400 Scientists develop breakthrough approach to create artificial allosteric sites in protein complexes
街头戏剧帮助马拉维人了解非洲昏睡病“寄生虫街头科学”是 Nicola Veitch 博士和格拉斯哥大学科学家团队最近发起的一个公众参与项目，该项目利用令人兴奋的街头戏剧表演来教育和娱乐英国和马拉维的观众有关非洲昏睡病的主题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Street-theater-helps-educate-Malawians-about-African-sleeping-sickness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Street-theater-helps-educate-Malawians-about-African-sleeping-sickness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b73e6c61-dbc5-405b-8006-2552e08b8316 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 12:59:36 -0400 Street theater helps educate Malawians about African sleeping sickness
OCT成像方法可以提高多发性硬化症的诊断维也纳医科大学神经病学系和维也纳大学医院的研究人员进行的一项研究首次证明，通过额外测量眼睛视网膜层的厚度可以显着改善多发性硬化症 (MS) 的诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/OCT-imaging-method-can-improve-diagnosis-of-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/OCT-imaging-method-can-improve-diagnosis-of-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50cc6c51-05c9-48a4-b506-1f2d3f5d044d Thu, 06 Jul 2023 12:16:00 -0400 OCT imaging method can improve diagnosis of multiple sclerosis
废水监测可以成为全球疾病监测的有效工具一项新的研究表明，废水监测可以作为早期预警系统，帮助各国更好地应对未来的流行病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Wastewater-monitoring-can-be-an- effective-tool-for-global-disease-surveillance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Wastewater-monitoring-can-be-an- effective-tool-for-global-disease-surveillance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f491c24-6733-44f5-821d-821ccac800cb Thu, 06 Jul 2023 11:59:29 -0400 Wastewater monitoring can be an effective tool for global disease surveillance
